review: Didn't know I needed a remote until we used this fire tv stick. We used chromecast before which I also really liked but having a remote makes using this so much easier to use. Built in youtube app makes everything seamless. Not laggy at all which chromecast used to be when casting from my phone. Now I can just use the built in app instead and somehow it doesn't lag as much. Used this to sing along with youtube karaoke. We used this to watch some tv shows from amazon prime (wish they had better/more shows though).  Love it! I don't use chromecast anymore. Amazon got it right.

review: after update, it won't stay connected even when sitting beside the router.  while it tries to connect to a very good connection, the connection then shows up as a very weak signal.  things may have been this way even before the update, but I'm not sure anymore.  all I know is the thing was good for 30 minutes, and now it's totally awful.UPDATE:I used the extender, plugged the stick into the wall, and moved the unit to the side hdmi port placing it right above the router this time.  It seems to work like it was meant to now.  Ideally, extender or not shouldn't make too much of a difference.  In this case, it mattered.
